pages.text: The one who choses the path of the $(d)Crusader$() wishes to protect others and fight for the things that are right and good. These alchemists are considered the defenders of the people. To create such a powerful weapon, three different parts must be made and combined.
The Great Weapon of all the Crusaders, who stand to protect those who matter most to them, and all those that surround them that are good.
